name: Demihuman Inc
description:
How long your business can survive in this exotic commodity market?!

                                                                                   

Welcome to the realm inhabited by fantastical creatures called demihumans!

Being half human - half beast is not the only thing that make them special. Their excess product was treated as an exotic items that many seeks due to their potent effect as medicines.

As one of the ambitious individual who aimed to capitalize the market, take the job to make the best exotic commodity production site ever! Gain your employee's trusts, maximize your commodity sales, and enjoy that fat cash on your bank!

But careful, the association is watching every moves you do! Do the business right and they'll let you to keep the license.

Are you prepared for the challenge?

***

Well ... that description was a bit overglorified. This is really just a casual idle mobile game you can play for killing time.

But I do really hope you like the game! Thank you for checking it out~!
